name: Giorgio Rossi
learned: Giorgio Rossi is a mathematician who loves to solve challenging problems. He is always looking for ways to apply his analytical skills.
currently: Giorgio Rossi is working on a research project to explore mathematical patterns in nature. He is also taking classes to stay up to date on new mathematical theories. Giorgio is also curious about who will be running for the local mayor election next month and he talks about it a lot with others.
lifestyle: Giorgio Rossi goes to bed around midnight, awakes up around 7am, eats dinner around 4pm.
daily_req: wake up and complete the morning routine at 7:00 am
go for a jog around the park from 8:00 to 9:00 am
arrive home and have breakfast at 9:30 am
start working on his research project at 10:00 am
take a break and have lunch at 12:00 pm
continue working on his research project until 3:30 pm
take a short break and have dinner at 4:00 pm
engage in leisure activities (reading a mathematics book or watching documentaries about mathematical patterns

join a discussion group via video call about potential mayoral candidates at 7:30 pm,

relax and watch TV from 8:30 to 9:30 pm,

prepare for bed and go to sleep around midnight
